As far as I can tell, the red channel on the normal map is being ignored, so the vertical ridges in the normal map aren't showing up. I checked the other parts I've done recently (fuel tanks), and the same problem occurs with them, though it isn't as noticeable.

I've tried everything I can think of and everything I've seen suggested here in the forums (such as inverting the green channel).

I'm all out of ideas.
Try rotating the channels, maybe KSP is using different ones.
Having the exact same issue though this is probably something wrong with the ksp shaders so hopefully this will be fixed.
Try to invert the green channel if your normal. C7 figured this out when developing .16.
The game indeed seems to ignore the red channel, everybody has the same problem sadly.
